item.description:
NE Healthcare Executive Meeting: American Healthcare Costs and Outcomes

When: Monday June 4, 2012 | 7:30 am- 10:00 am
Where: Broad Institute of MIT and Harvard

Learn more and register on http://nehenjune2012.eventbrite.com/?ref=enivtefor&utm_source=eb_email&utm_media=email&utm_compaign=invitefor&utm_term=readmore&invite=MjA0OTk5MS9hbGFuQGFsYW5kbHVjYXMuY29tLzA=.

Â 

Dr. Robert Wah, Cathy Schoen, and David Martin will speak about new developments in containing healthcare costs in the US healthcare system. They will provide a review of the costs and outcomes of America versus other Western countries and then suggest how we can improve the results. The panel will further discuss and there will be extensive Q&A from the audience.
item.name: NE Healthcare Executive Meeting: American Healthcare Costs and Outcomes
